TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Ssama, title = Ssama, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ssama} }

S.FORM: = Ssama = Smkuxul ku bi mkan sama yaku. Ssiyaw sapah mu o egu bi ka ssama yasa nniqan mu o gaga ruwan dgiyaq.
= Ssama = Smkoxol ko bi mkan sama yako. Ssiyaw sapah mo o ego bi ka ssama yasa nniqan mo o gaga rowan dgiyaq.
